title: 06/14/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/14/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the NBA Playoff action from the weekend with former NBA players Dennis Scott and Mark Jackson. Should Jokic have been tossed from yesterday's game? What does this playoff run do for Chris Paul's legacy? Dan also recaps Novak Djkovic's win at the French Open.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
